title: Concerning motions during a meeting
context: Formally propose an idea for the group to vote on.

content.bestLine: I propose we consider this option for a vote.

neutral.text: Let's put this to a vote
Shall we proceed with a vote?
We need to vote on this matter

formal.text: I move that we adopt this proposal
I propose this motion for consideration
I recommend we put this to a vote
It is proposed that we vote on this matter

patterns.meaning: to suggest something for the group to consider
to take action on a proposal

dialogs.description: Formally proposing an idea in a meeting

lines.speaker: John
lines.text: I propose we consider a new marketing strategy for our product.

lines.speaker: Jane
lines.text: I second that motion. Let's put it to a vote.

lines.speaker: Bob
lines.text: I recommend we adopt this proposal. It will benefit the company in the long run.

lines.speaker: Alice
lines.text: I agree. Let's formally consider this option and vote on it.
